author: craigmcc
msg: Initial release notes document for the next beta, including the fixes
and improvements that Glenn has already checked in.
It would help a lot at release time if committers would update this
document as well when adding new features or patching bugs.  :-)

author: craigmcc
msg: Revert version numbers back to "4.0-dev" so there is no confusion about
being a nightly build or not.

author: glenn
msg: Ignore the directory exists exception when context startup try's to expand a war file that is already expanded.

author: glenn
msg: Ensure socket ignores and logs SocketPermission AccessControlException's
